title: Criticism of the Bible - Collection 34
description:
Criticism of the Bible - Collection 34:

We have 31 titles here:

-  Beck - Translators as Storytellers; a Study in Septuagint Translation Technique (2000)

-  Brueggemann & Sharp - Disruptive Grace; Reflections on God, Scripture, and the Church (2011)

-  Claassens & Spronk (Eds.) - Fragile Dignity; Intercontextual Conversations on Scriptures, Family, and Violence (2013)

-  Dozeman et al (Eds.) - The Pentateuch; International Perspectives on Current Research (2011)

-  Ehrman - Didymus the Blind and the Text of the Gospels (1986)

-  Ehrman - The New Testament; a Historical Introduction to the Early Christian Writings (2000)

-  Ehrman, Fee & Homes - The Text of the Fourth Gospel in the Writings of Origen, Vol. 1 (1992)

-  Epp - Perspectives on New Testament Textual Criticism; Collected Essays, 1962-2004 (2005)

-  Epp & Fee - Studies in the Theory and Method of New Testament Textual Criticism (1993)

-  Feldt - The Fantastic in Religious Narrative from Exodus to Elisha (2012)

-  Fredriksen - From Jesus to Christ; the Origins of the New Testament Images of Jesus, 2e (2000)

-  Frymer-Kensky - Studies in Bible and Feminist Criticism (2006)

-  Harrisville & Sundberg - The Bible in Modern Culture; Baruch Spinoza to Brevard Childs, 2e (2002)

-  Hays & Ansberry (Eds.) - Evangelical Faith and the Challenge of Historical Criticism (2013)

-  Jenkins - Hidden Gospels; How the Search for Jesus Lost Its Way (2001)

-  Komarnitsky - Doubting Jesus' Resurrection; What Happened in the Black Box (2009)

-  Lamb - Prostitutes and Polygamists; a Look at Love, Old Testament Style (2015)

-  Metzger & Ehrman - The Text of the New Testament; Its Transmission, Corruption, and Restoration, 4e (2005)

-  Meyer - Secret Gospels; Essays on Thomas and the Secret Gospel of Mark (2003)

-  Nelson-Pallmeyer - Jesus Against Christianity; Reclaiming the Missing Jesus (2001)

-  Parker - Textual Scholarship and the Making of the New Testament (2012)

-  Porter & Gabriel - Johannine Writings and Apocalyptic; an Annotated Bibliography (2013)

-  Rowland & Tucket (Eds.) - The Nature of New Testament Theology; Essays in Honour of Robert Morgan (2006)

-  Spong - The Sins of Scripture; Exposing the Bible's Texts of Hate to Reveal the God of Love (2005)

-  Talmon - Text and Canon of the Hebrew Bible; Collected Studies (2010)

-  Tov - Hebrew Bible, Greek Bible, and Qumran; Collected Essays (2008)

-  Tov - The Text-Critical Use of the Septuagint in Biblical Research, 3e (2015)

-  Waard - A Handbook on Isaiah; Textual Criticism and the Translator, Vol. I (1997)

-  Wells - Drunk with Blood; God's Killings in the Bible, 2e (2013)

-  Yamada - Configurations of Rape in the Hebrew Bible; a Literary Analysis of Three Rape Narratives (2008)

-  Zornberg - Bewilderments; Reflections on the Book of Numbers (2015)
